en: According to this magazine, the economic situation in Japan is getting worse year by year.
zh: 这杂志上说，日本的经济状况一年不如一年。

en: According to this magazine, my favorite actress will marry a jazz musician next spring.
zh: 据这本杂志说，我最喜欢的女演员明年春天要嫁给一个爵士乐手了。

en: I will have to get rid of this worn-out carpet.
zh: 我得把这块破地毯给处理掉。

en: The girl who wrote this composition is Nancy.
zh: 写这篇作文的女孩是南希。

en: This composition leaves nothing to be desired.
zh: 这篇作文写得堪称完美。

en: This composition is so badly written than I can not make out what he means.
zh: 这篇作文写得太烂了，我根本看不懂他想说什么。

en: There are a few mistakes in this composition.
zh: 这篇作文里有几个错处。

en: This composition is free from errors.
zh: 这篇作文一个错都没有。

en: This work is beyond my grasp.
zh: 这活儿我可揽不下来。

en: This work is an improvement on your last.
zh: 这次比你上次做得好。

en: The threats to this strategy are numerous.
zh: 这个策略面临的风险挺多的。

en: I'd like you to pick up the pace a little on this job.
zh: 这活儿你能不能稍微快一点？

en: This writer is at his best in his short stories.
zh: 这个作家最擅长写短篇小说。

en: Where did you find this wallet?
zh: 你在哪儿捡到这个钱包的？

en: This purse is made of paper.
zh: 这个钱包是纸做的。

en: I think that this material is of benefit to everyone.
zh: 我觉得这材料对大家都有好处。

en: This material has no give.
zh: 这料子没弹性。

en: When the Englishman heard this last question, he could not believe his ears.
zh: 那个英国人听到最后这个问题时，简直不敢相信自己的耳朵。

en: Please air the zabuton.
zh: 把坐垫拿出去晒晒。

en: I wish you would tell me what I ought to do in this difficult situation.
zh: 这种困境下，真希望你能告诉我该怎么办。

en: I've been in bad shape these days.
zh: 我这几天状态挺差的。

en: I am gardening these days just to kill time.
zh: 我这阵子搞园艺就是为了打发时间。

en: Nowadays she is lost in tennis.
zh: 她最近迷上打网球了。

en: Jobs are hard come by these days.
zh: 现在工作挺难找的。

en: Everyone seems to be short of money these days.
zh: 最近大家好像都挺缺钱的。

en: We often hear about an energy crisis these days.
zh: 最近常听说能源危机的事。

en: Nowadays, traveling costs a lot of money.
zh: 现在出门旅游挺贵的。

en: You don't seem to be yourself these days.
zh: 你这几天看着不太对劲。

en: This antique brazier no longer has any real utility.
zh: 这个古董火盆已经没啥实际用途了。

en: This hard work has made me very tired.
zh: 这活儿干得我累死了。

en: This blackboard is not black, but green.
zh: 这黑板不是黑的，是绿的。

en: There is much sugar in this black box.
zh: 这个黑盒子里装了不少糖。

en: This national park is full of beautiful scenery.
zh: 这个国家公园景色特别美。

en: This national treasure can be seen by the public only once a year.
zh: 这件国宝每年只对外展出一次。

en: This country was subject to a neighboring country.
zh: 这个国家以前是邻国的附庸。

en: This country is really going to the dogs!
zh: 这国家真是一天不如一天了。

en: This country has an even temperature throughout the year.
zh: 这个国家一年到头气温都差不多。

en: This country is rich in oil.
zh: 这国家石油挺多的。

en: This country is rich in coal.
zh: 这国家盛产煤炭。

en: This is the most beautiful country I have ever visited.
zh: 这是我去过的最漂亮的国家。

en: This country is safe from attack.
zh: 这个国家很安全，不用担心被袭击。

en: This country has four seasons.
zh: 这个国家四季分明。

en: This country has a mild climate.
zh: 这个国家气候挺温和的。

en: Rain is scarce in this country.
zh: 这个国家雨水特别少。

en: How long do you plan to stay in this country?
zh: 你打算在这个国家待多久？

en: The climate is mild in this country.
zh: 这里的气候挺温和的。

en: Please show me some of the travel guides for this country.
zh: 请给我看下这个国家的旅游指南。

en: People in this country make it a habit to bow when they meet.
zh: 这个国家的人见面习惯鞠躬。

en: People of this country do not respect their old traditions any longer.
zh: 这个国家的人不再尊重老传统了。

en: The population of the country is roughly estimated at 50,000,000.
zh: 这个国家的人口大概有五千万。

en: The population of this country is diminishing.
zh: 这个国家的人口正在减少。

en: The population of this country is smaller than that of the United States.
zh: 这个国家的人口比美国少。

en: I am uneasy about the future of this country.
zh: 我对这个国家的未来挺担心的。

en: What are the main products of this country?
zh: 这个国家的主要产品有哪些？

en: One of the main products of this country is coffee.
zh: 咖啡是这个国家的主要产品之一。

en: This nation's economy is growing by leaps and bounds in recent years.
zh: 这几年这个国家的经济增长得飞快。

en: Several universities in this country enjoy great prestige.
zh: 这个国家的几所大学很有名气。

en: What's your purpose in visiting this country?
zh: 你来这个国家是干嘛的？

en: My faith in this country was never shaken.
zh: 我对这个国家的信心从未动摇过。

en: There were no Japanese in this country.
zh: 以前这个国家没有日本人。

en: There are many cities in this country.
zh: 这个国家有很多城市。

en: Oil is scarce in this country.
zh: 这个国家挺缺石油的。

en: Some of them go without shoes in this country.
zh: 这个国家有些人不穿鞋。

en: Foreign tourists in this country are numerous.
zh: 这个国家的外国游客特别多。

en: It was the most popular sport in this country.
zh: 这是这个国家最受欢迎的运动。

en: Cultures of the East and the West are mixed in this country.
zh: 这个国家中西方文化交融。

en: Women didn't use to talk politics in this country.
zh: 以前这个国家的女性不怎么谈论政治。

en: A lot of children live from hand to mouth in this country.
zh: 这个国家有很多小孩过着勉强糊口的日子。

en: A politician has to be able to stick with any lies in this country.
zh: 在这个国家，政客得能圆好任何谎话。

en: The birthrate is rapidly declining in this country.
zh: 这个国家的出生率正在快速下降。

en: Freedom of speech was restricted in this country.
zh: 以前这个国家的言论自由受到限制。

en: In this country there are only few examples that ideology and religion are helpful in character building for people.
zh: 在这个国家，很少有通过意识形态或宗教来帮助塑造人格的例子。

en: For too long society has placed sole emphasis on children's test results, to the detriment of social discipline.
zh: 长期以来，社会只看重孩子的考试成绩，结果损害了社会风气。

en: Money lending is a profitable business in this country.
zh: 在这个国家，放贷是个挺赚钱的买卖。

en: They cannot do without camels in this country.
zh: 在这个国家，他们离了骆驼不行。

en: Every fifth person has a car in this country.
zh: 这个国家每五个人里就有一个有车的。

en: It is unlikely that this indictment will lead to his deportation.
zh: 这次起诉应该不至于让他被驱逐出境。

en: There are no fewer than a dozen bedrooms in this mansion.
zh: 这栋豪宅里起码有十几个卧室。

en: These totals check with mine.
zh: 这些总数跟我算的一样。

en: This expressway connects Tokyo with Nagoya.
zh: 这条高速公路连接着东京和名古屋。

en: This high humidity makes me feel tired.
zh: 这么潮的天气让我觉得挺累的。

en: He won't come in a rain like this.
zh: 这么大的雨，他是不会来的。

en: This steel is stainless.
zh: 这种钢是不锈钢。

en: This mine will close down next month.
zh: 这个矿下个月就要关了。

en: Please give us a call now if you want to participate in the workshop!
zh: 想参加研讨会的话，现在就给我们打电话吧！

en: This course will help you master correct pronunciation.
zh: 这门课会帮你掌握正确的发音。

en: This course teaches basic skills in First Aid.
zh: 这门课教的是急救基本技能。

en: This aircraft company deals with freight only.
zh: 这家航空公司只做货运。

en: This action makes me grumble.
zh: 这事儿让我忍不住想抱怨。

en: I assume that this idea will work well.
zh: 我觉得这个主意应该行得通。

en: I intend to hammer this idea into the student's heads.
zh: 我打算把这个想法灌输进学生们的脑子里。

en: I have to oppose this idea.
zh: 我必须反对这个提议。

en: This idea is the basis of my argument.
zh: 这个观点是我论点的基础。

en: The harbor can be blocked.
zh: 港口可能会被封锁。

en: These structures would rarely, if ever, occur in spoken English.
zh: 这些结构在英语口语里几乎见不到。

en: We encounter similar difficulties when we substitute rectangles for triangles in this configuration.
zh: 在这个布局中，如果我们用长方形代替三角形，会遇到类似的困难。

en: That's an interesting ad.
zh: 那个广告挺有意思的。

en: This factory's productive capacity is 250 cars a week.
zh: 这家工厂的周产能是250辆车。

en: This factory produces 500 automobiles a day.
zh: 这家工厂一天生产500辆汽车。

en: This factory can turn out 200 cars a day.
zh: 这家工厂一天能产200辆车。

en: Robots have taken the place of men in this factory.
zh: 这家工厂已经用机器人代替人工了。

en: They are manufacturing TV sets in this factory.
zh: 这家工厂是生产电视机的。

en: We'll have a good crop if this good weather keeps up.
zh: 要是这好天气能持续下去，我们就能有个好收成了。

en: Don't let this chance slip by.
zh: 别让这个机会溜走了。

en: Avail yourself of this opportunity.
zh: 好好利用这个机会。

en: I cannot finish reading this thick book in a week.
zh: 一个星期我读不完这本厚书。

en: This play has ended.
zh: 这出戏结束了。

en: This park reminds me of my childhood.
zh: 这个公园让我想起了我的童年。

en: On Saturdays, we usually visit in this park.
zh: 周六我们通常会来这个公园转转。

en: This park is at its best in spring.
zh: 这个公园春天最美。

en: This park is really beautiful and clean.
zh: 这个公园又漂亮又干净。

en: This park is a paradise for children.
zh: 这个公园是孩子们的乐园。

en: This park used to be a hunting ground for a noble family.
zh: 这个公园以前是贵族的猎场。

en: This park lends itself to recreation.
zh: 这个公园挺适合休闲娱乐的。

en: This park is famous for its roses.
zh: 这个公园的玫瑰花很有名。

en: How big is this park?
zh: 这个公园有多大？

en: The park is open to everybody.
zh: 公园对所有人开放。

en: This park is more beautiful than that.
zh: 这个公园比那个漂亮。

en: This park is famous for its cherry blossoms.
zh: 这个公园的樱花很有名。

en: There are many birds in this park.
zh: 这个公园里有很多鸟。

en: There are as many as two hundred cherry trees in this park.
zh: 这个公园里有两百多棵樱花树。

en: Can we roller-skate in this park?
zh: 我们能在这个公园滑旱冰吗？

en: We want to break off this negotiation.
zh: 我们想中止这次谈判。

en: What's the name of this intersection?
zh: 这个路口叫什么？

en: This symphony is a real masterpiece.
zh: 这首交响曲真是部杰作。

en: Can you clearly define this word?
zh: 你能明确给这个词下个定义吗？

en: This word is also French in origin.
zh: 这个词也源自法语。

en: This word has gone out of use.
zh: 这个词已经没人用了。

en: This word is not in current use.
zh: 这个词现在不用了。

en: This word is still in use.
zh: 这个词现在还在用。

en: This word was borrowed from French.
zh: 这个词是从法语里借来的。

en: This word is derived from Greek.
zh: 这个词源自希腊语。

en: The accent of this word is on the second syllable.
zh: 这个词的重音在第二个音节上。

en: How is the word accented?
zh: 这个词重音在哪？

en: This word has a double meaning.
zh: 这个词有双重含义。

en: Let the tea draw for ten minutes.
zh: 让茶泡个十分钟。

en: This lake is the deepest in Japan.
zh: 这个湖是日本最深的湖。

en: This lake is deep.
zh: 这个湖很深。

en: How deep this lake is!
zh: 这湖可真深啊！

en: This lake is among the deepest in the country.
zh: 这个湖是全国最深的湖之一。

en: This lake is deepest at this point.
zh: 湖水在这里最深。

en: This lake is the deepest in this country.
zh: 这个湖是这个国家最深的。

en: The lake is deepest at this point.
zh: 这个湖这里最深。

en: How deep is this lake?
zh: 这个湖有多深？

en: This lake abounds in various kinds of fish.
zh: 这个湖里的鱼种类非常丰富。

en: Fish abound in this lake.
zh: 这个湖里鱼很多。

en: This lake abounds in trout.
zh: 这个湖里有很多鳟鱼。

en: Some believe Nessie lives in this lake.
zh: 有人相信尼斯湖水怪住在这个湖里。

en: A mysterious legend has been handed down about this lake.
zh: 关于这个湖有个流传已久的神秘传说。

en: It's dangerous to swim in this lake.
zh: 在这个湖里游泳很危险。

en: It is safe to skate on this lake.
zh: 在这湖上滑冰很安全。

en: This lake supplies our city with water.
zh: 咱们城市的供水就靠这个湖。

en: This door won't lock.
zh: 这扇门锁不上。

en: The door will not open.
zh: 门打不开。

en: Everyone knows that there is something new in this old capital.
zh: 大家都知道这座古都里也有一些新气象。

en: This antique clock is worth one thousand dollars.
zh: 这个古董钟值一千美元。

en: This old book is quite out of date.
zh: 这本旧书已经过时了。

en: This old book is worth 50,000 yen.
zh: 这本旧书值五万日元。

en: Nothing ever happens in this old village.
zh: 这个古老的村子里啥事儿也没发生过。

en: I want to have this old coat made over.
zh: 这件旧外套我想改一下。

en: This old coat has had it.
zh: 这件旧大衣已经没法穿了。

en: I don't think this old car will make it to the top of the hill.
zh: 我觉得这辆破车开不到山顶。

en: This old building has seen better days.
zh: 这栋旧楼已经大不如前了。

en: This old building isn't worth fixing up. It would be better to tear it down.
zh: 这栋老房子不值得翻修了，还不如拆了呢。

en: This old fish has a strange taste.
zh: 这条陈鱼吃起来味道怪怪的。

en: We should do away with these old rules.
zh: 咱们该废除这些旧规矩了。

en: This old house is made of wood.
zh: 这座老房子是木头盖的。

en: They say this old house is haunted.
zh: 听说这间老屋子闹鬼。

en: This old French table is a very valuable piece of furniture.
zh: 这张旧的法式桌子是一件很值钱的家具。

en: This old table is still in use.
zh: 这张旧桌子现在还在用。

en: This old suit is just about done for; I shall have to get a new one.
zh: 这身旧西装快穿烂了，我得去买身新的。

en: This proverb is worth remembering.
zh: 这句谚语值得记一下。

en: This word conjures up a new way of life.
zh: 这个词让人联想到一种全新的生活方式。

en: Is this word in common use?
zh: 这个词常用吗？

en: This word comes from Greek.
zh: 这个词源自希腊语。

en: This word does not translate well.
zh: 这个词不太好翻译。

en: These words were spoken by someone who shall be nameless.
zh: 这是一个不愿透露姓名的人说的。

en: The word came to be used for all small heavenly bodies revolving about larger ones.
zh: 这个词后来被用来指代所有绕着大天体运行的小天体。

en: Please tell me how to pronounce this word.
zh: 请告诉我这个词怎么念。

en: These words brought tears to her eyes.
zh: 听到这些话，她流下了眼泪。

en: We can conclude that this phenomenon is not related to either pollutant.
zh: 我们可以得出结论，这种现象与这两种污染物都没有关系。

en: There is not a physical explanation for this phenomenon yet.
zh: 这种现象目前还没有物理学上的解释。

en: This general rule refers only to children.
zh: 这条通则只适用于儿童。

en: I'd better rewrite this paper.
zh: 我最好把这篇论文重写一遍。

en: This microscope magnifies objects by 100 times.
zh: 这台显微镜能把物体放大一百倍。

en: Please take charge of this key.
zh: 请帮我保管好这把钥匙。

en: This key admits to his room.
zh: 这把钥匙是开他房间门的。

en: I'm afraid this key does not fit.
zh: 恐怕这把钥匙对不上锁。

en: Where can I find an outlet for all my anger?
zh: 我要去哪儿发泄我这一肚子的火呢？

en: This guard is very strong.
zh: 这个守卫非常强壮。

en: From this standpoint history can be divided into two main epochs.
zh: 从这个角度来看，历史可以分为两个主要时代。

en: From this point of view, you are right.
zh: 从这个观点来看，你是对的。

en: This offer expires on August 15, 1999.
zh: 这项优惠在1999年8月15日到期。

en: This silk feels smooth.
zh: 这种丝绸摸起来很顺滑。

en: I hope this expense report contains all the relevant business expenses because I'm not paying a cent more after this.
zh: 我希望这份报销单里已经包括了所有相关的业务开支，因为之后我一分钱都不会再出了。

en: This laboratory is where we study every day.
zh: 实验室就是我们每天学习的地方。

en: This study compares the immigration policies of various nations.
zh: 这项研究对比了各个国家的移民政策。

en: In the early part of my study, I allude to work that had already been done on the psychology of crowd-control.
zh: 在研究的初期，我提到了关于群体控制心理学的一些已有工作。

en: The patients in this study consisted of 30 males and 25 females.
zh: 这项研究的患者包括30名男性和25名女性。

en: To what extent did he play a part in the research project?
zh: 他在这个研究项目里参与到了什么程度？

en: It took me five hours to make this kennel.
zh: 我花了五个小时才搭好这个狗窝。

en: This dog is trained to smell out drugs.
zh: 这只狗受过训练，能嗅出毒品。

en: Who looks after this dog?
zh: 这只狗是谁在管？

en: This dog is big.
zh: 这条狗挺大的。

en: The dog is as good as dead.
zh: 这条狗快不行了。

en: This dog is a mongrel.
zh: 这条狗是个串串。

en: This dog is trained to save people in the mountains.
zh: 这只狗受过在山里救人的训练。

en: This dog is, so to speak, a member of our family.
zh: 可以说，这只狗就是我们的家人。

en: This dog is conditioned to bark at strangers.
zh: 这条狗习惯了对陌生人叫。

en: This dog is our regimental mascot.
zh: 这条狗是我们团的吉祥物。

en: This dog eats almost anything.
zh: 这只狗几乎什么都吃。

en: This dog minds well.
zh: 这只狗很听话。

en: The dog has a keen scent.
zh: 这只狗嗅觉很灵。

en: How clever this dog is!
zh: 这只狗多聪明啊！

en: This dog is more attached to us than this cat.
zh: 这只狗比这只猫跟我们更亲。

en: This dog was born two months ago.
zh: 这只狗是两个月前出生的。

en: This dog is the biggest in this town.
zh: 这只狗是这个镇上最大的。

en: You must not smoke in this building.
zh: 这栋楼里禁止抽烟。

en: This right must be protected at all costs.
zh: 无论如何都要保护这项权利。

en: I want this building for a garage.
zh: 我想把这栋楼当车库用。

en: This building is very large.
zh: 这栋楼很大。

en: This building also is a bank.
zh: 这栋楼也是一家银行。

en: This building was named after him.
zh: 这栋楼是以他的名字命名的。

en: The structure is deficient in harmony.
zh: 这个建筑结构不太协调。

en: This building is made of stone.
zh: 这栋楼是石头盖的。

en: This building looks large from the front, but not from the side.

en: This school has many students.
zh: 这个学校的学生挺多的。

en: This school supplies students with textbooks.
zh: 这个学校给学生发课本。

en: The standards for admission to this school are very high.
zh: 这个学校的入学标准非常高。

en: The students of this school are kind.
zh: 这个学校的学生人都挺好的。

en: Any student of this school must learn one more foreign language besides English.
zh: 这个学校的每个学生除了英语，都还得再学一门外语。

en: Let me tell you about the origin of this school.
zh: 我来给你讲讲这个学校的由来。

en: Only 16 percent of the teachers of this school are female.
zh: 这个学校只有16%的老师是女的。

en: The curriculum of this school is wide and shallow.
zh: 这个学校的课程虽然广，但学得不深。

en: Two-thirds of the students of this school are boys.
zh: 这个学校三分之二的学生都是男生。

en: This school has several foreigners on the roll.
zh: 这个学校的名册上有几个外国人。

en: There are forty-one teachers and about eight hundred students in this school.
zh: 这个学校有41个老师和大约800个学生。

en: Talented students come from far and wide to attend this school.
zh: 各地的尖子生都慕名来这所学校上学。

en: There used to be a bake-shop on this corner.
zh: 这个拐角以前有一家面包店。

en: No country under the sun is safe in this nuclear age.
zh: 在这个核时代，世界上没有哪个国家是绝对安全的。

en: What has brought you to this city?
zh: 是什么风把你吹到这个城市来了？

en: This town has undergone a rapid change.
zh: 这个小镇的变化非常快。

en: It's been ten years since I came to this town.
zh: 我来这个小镇已经十年了。

en: Please drop in to see us any time you're in town.
zh: 你来镇上的时候，随时来找我们坐坐。

en: I tried to find out how many people really live in this town.
zh: 我试着打听了一下这个小镇到底有多少人。

en: Go up these stairs.
zh: 从这些台阶上去。

en: These cough lozenges taste bitter but they will do you much good.
zh: 这些止咳糖吃着苦，但对你有好处。

en: This picture is of my uncle.
zh: 这张照片里是我叔叔。

en: This drawing dates back to the fifteenth century.
zh: 这幅画可以追溯到15世纪。

en: This painting is attributed to Picasso.
zh: 这幅画被认为是毕加索的作品。

en: Put these pictures up us for wall, please.
zh: 请把这些画挂到墙上去。

en: It is me that painted this picture.
zh: 这幅画是我画的。

en: When I painted this picture, I was 23 years old.
zh: 我画这幅画的时候才23岁。

en: Could you hold this picture straight for a while?
zh: 你能帮我把这张画扶正一会儿吗？

en: I cannot look at this picture without thinking of my dead mother.
zh: 我一看到这张照片，就会想起我过世的母亲。

en: This picture reminds me of our happy days in England.
zh: 这张照片让我想起了我们在英国的那段快乐日子。

en: I cannot see this picture without remembering my childhood.
zh: 我一看到这张照片，就会想起我的童年。

en: This picture always reminds me of my hometown.
zh: 这张照片总是让我想起我的家乡。

en: I can't see this picture without thinking of my mother.
zh: 我一看到这张照片，就会想起我妈。

en: Look at this picture.
zh: 看看这张照片。

en: How did you come by this painting?
zh: 你是怎么弄到这幅画的？

en: This painting will pass for genuine.
zh: 这幅画足以乱真。

en: Is this a picture of his own drawing?
zh: 这张画是他自己画的吗？

en: By whom was this picture painted?
zh: 这幅画是谁画的？

en: The picture is done in a masterly style.
zh: 这幅画画得很有大师风范。

en: This painting is a representation of a storm at sea.
zh: 这幅画画的是海上的风暴。

en: This painting is attributed to Monet.
zh: 这幅画被认为是莫奈的作品。

en: The picture was painted by a famous painter.
zh: 这幅画是一位名画家画的。

en: This painting is worth a great deal of money.
zh: 这幅画值很多钱。

en: You will find the scene just as you see it in this picture.
zh: 你会发现实景就和这张照片里的一模一样。

en: It's not hard to see what the results of this rise will be.
zh: 不难预见这种上涨会带来什么后果。

en: You aren't allowed to swim at this beach.
zh: 这个海滩不准游泳。

en: It is very pleasant to sail these waters.
zh: 在这片水域航行非常舒服。

en: This flashlight is getting dim.
zh: 这个手电筒越来越暗了。

en: This flashlight needs two batteries.
zh: 这个手电筒需要两节电池。

en: Could you put these fragile things in a safe place?
zh: 你能把这些易碎品放个安全的地方吗？

en: This broken vase can't be repaired.
zh: 这个碎了的花瓶没法修了。

en: This connection is too slow for me to watch movies.
zh: 这网速太慢了，我看不了电影。

en: I mean to quit this company.
zh: 我打算离开这家公司。

en: This company has a fine organization.
zh: 这家公司的组织架构很完善。

en: The company deals in various goods.
zh: 这家公司经营各种商品。

en: This corporation is well known for its communication equipment.
zh: 这家公司以其通讯设备而闻名。

en: Who do you think will take over the company?
zh: 你觉得谁会接管这家公司？

en: This firm prints a lot of educational books.
zh: 这家公司出版很多教育类书籍。

en: This firm ranks second in the oil trade.
zh: 这家公司在石油贸易行业排第二。

en: In this company, there are more women than men.
zh: 这家公司女员工比男员工多。

en: My grandfather founded and my parents developed this company.
zh: 这家公司是我爷爷创办的，后来由我父母发展壮大。

en: This firm manufactures cars at the rate of two hundred per day.
zh: 这家公司每天生产两百辆车。

en: I felt like a fish out of water at this firm.
zh: 我在这家公司觉得格格不入。

en: This company manufactures televisions.
zh: 这家公司生产电视机。

en: Two thirds of the employees of this company are engineers.
zh: 这家公司有三分之二的员工是工程师。

en: Who is the boss of this company?
zh: 这家公司的老板是谁？

en: This office is divided up into camps.
zh: 这个办公室里分成了几个小派系。

en: This firm has a hundred employees.
zh: 这家公司有一百名员工。

en: Manual labor is necessary in this company.
zh: 在这家公司，体力活是必不可少的。

en: Chances of promotion are slim in this firm.
zh: 在这家公司，晋升的机会很渺茫。

en: In this firm, women work on equal terms with men.
zh: 在这家公司，男女同工同酬。

en: Women work on equal terms with men in this firm.
zh: 在这家公司，女性享有和男性平等的待遇。

en: You must be able to speak either English or Spanish in this company.
zh: 在这家公司，你得会说英语或西班牙语。

en: Monday through Friday are work-days in this company.
zh: 这家公司周一到周五是工作日。

en: Do you know his status in the company?
zh: 你知道他在公司的地位吗？

en: I would quit before I would do that job in this company.
zh: 我宁愿辞职也不在这家公司干那份活儿。

en: Rather than putting off this meeting, why don't we just call it off?
zh: 与其推迟会议，不如干脆取消吧？
